header.title: JSON Formatter & Validator
header.subtitle: Format, validate, and beautify JSON instantly with detailed error reporting and a unique goth aesthetic

validation.title: Real-Time JSON Validation
validation.desc: Instantly validate your JSON with detailed error messages, line numbers, and code snippets to help you fix issues quickly.

formatting.title: Advanced Formatting
formatting.desc: Format and beautify JSON with customizable indentation (2, 4, 6, or 8 spaces). Choose from multiple viewer themes.

multipage.title: Multi-Page Documents
multipage.desc: Work with multiple JSON documents simultaneously using our tabbed pagination system. Switch between pages without losing your work.

themes.title: Customizable Themes
themes.desc: Select from multiple JSON viewer themes including Monokai, Apathy, and Bright. Match your preferred coding style.

private.title: 100% Private & Client-Side
private.desc: All processing happens in your browser. No data is sent to any server. Your JSON stays completely private.

offline.title: Works Offline
offline.desc: Once loaded, JGoth Validator works without an internet connection. Format and validate JSON anywhere, anytime.
